page.title: 09 SPARGROVE MANOR NR.BRUTON
page.content: Spargrove Manor lies to the north- west of Bruton and is one of the more interesting places to visit in the area.The village of Spargrove has more or less disappeared now,declining over the centuries.So has the original manor,but the one that still stands today dates from the early 18th century.It is set in a very rural location. The manor is deserted and has been for several decades.Geraniums grow in and around the window frames and the whole place is overgrown.Seen in the early evening,in the still quiet of the countryside,a very spooky atmosphere envelops one.It is said that the manor is haunted and that comes as no surprise.Nearby is an old mill,inhabited but no longer in working order.A serene setting, Spargrove Manor seems almost unreal.
